001package hw5;
002
003/**
004 * This class represents a mutable singular node as part of a graph. A node can hold
005 * some form of data.
006 *
007 * Specification fields:
008 *  @specfield data : String // The information that the node represents.
009 *
010 *
011 * Abstract Invariant:
012 *  A node must not be null.
013 */
014public class Node implements Comparable<Node> {
015        
016        private String data;
017
018        // Abstraction Function:
019        // Some abstraction function of what a node is..
020        // blah blah blah
021        
022        // Representation invariant for every Node n:
023        // rep invariaent for every node
024        // Node value != null
025
026        /**
027         * Creates a new node with an empty string.
028         * 
029         * @modifies this
030         * @effects Sets data equal to a blank string. (data = "")
031         */
032        public Node() {
033                this("");
034        }
035        
036        /**
037         * Creates a new node with the given value.
038         * 
039         * @requires value != null
040         * @modifies this
041         * @effects Sets data equal to the given value.
042         * @throws IllegalArgumentException if value == null.
043         */
044        public Node(String value) {
045                this.data = value;
046                checkRep();
047        }
048        
049        /**
050         * Gets the current value of this node.
051         * 
052         * @returns The current value this represents.
053         */
054        public String getData() {
055                return this.data;
056        }
057        
058        /**
059         * Returns true if Node stores an empty value.
060         * 
061         * @returns True if data is a blank string, otherwise false.
062         */
063        public boolean isEmpty() {
064                checkRep();
065                return (this.data.equals(""));
066        }
067        
068        //toString();
069        /**
070         * Compares this to another object of type Node.
071         * 
072         * @returns If this > other returns a positive int.
073         *               If this < other returns a negative int.
074         *               If this == other returns 0.
075         */
076        public int compareTo(Node other) {
077                checkRep();
078                return this.data.compareTo(other.data);
079        }
080        
081        /**
082         * Compares if this equals other object of Node.
083         * 
084         * @requires o is an instanceof Node
085         * @returns True if o equals this; false otherwise
086         */
087        @Override
088        public boolean equals(Object o) {
089                if (o == this)
090                        return true;
091                if(!(o instanceof Node))
092                        return false;
093                Node other = (Node)o;
094                return other.data.equals(this.data);
095        }
096        
097        /**
098         * @returns a hash code for this
099         */
100        @Override
101        public int hashCode() {
102                int result = 1;
103                result = result * 31 * this.data.hashCode();
104                return result;
105        }
106        
107        /**
108         * @returns a string representation of this
109         */
110        @Override
111        public String toString() {
112                return "Node: " + this.data;
113        }
114        
115        /**
116         * Checks that the representation invariant holds (if any).
117         */
118        private void checkRep() {
119                assert (this.data != null);
120        }
121}
